name: Proof_371 â€” Visiting the Empty Duck Shelter MaMeeFarm | DGCPâ„¢
description:
This proof documents a daily morning visit to an empty duck shelter at MaMeeFarm on
22 December 2025 at 07:21 AM (GMT+7).

The image shows a bamboo-built duck shelter with no animals present. Despite the absence of ducks, the shelter is still visited and observed every day. This act represents continuity of responsibility, even when production has stopped and no immediate economic return exists.

The scene reflects a persistent reality: infrastructure remains, labor continues, but access to opportunity within existing systems has never reached this farm. What remains is verifiable, lived data â€” recorded honestly without performance or embellishment.

This proof emphasizes one of the core principles of DGCP:

Even when systems fail to provide opportunity, real-world data continues to exist and deserves to be recorded.

The timestamp embedded in the image anchors the moment in time and preserves its integrity as part of the MaMeeFarm real-work archive.

This record is part of the DGCP MaMeeFarm DATA collection on OpenSea.
